name: AnamorphicFeelings
description:
This story, divided into three chapters, tells about the evolution of a relationship, any kind of relationship studying the different aspects of our life. Every relationship is characterized from several points of view, so, the 3D composition is an anamorphism. A set of objects that only from the only point give the observer the correct image.
So, here we have the first instant, that magic moment in which you see that person that you know will be part of your life from that moment.
